name: Ionic 5 Material UI Kit (Community)
description:
Ionic 5 Material UI Kit


Currently working on upgrading this to Ionic 6, I'll be sharing updates as I finish components!


I couldn't find a free Ionic 5 UI kit anywhere. So I made this for myself and everyone else!


Includes some templates for enterprise backend apps that I designed and shipped using this.


Open Source Code

Youtube Tutorial Series


Leave a comment, or DM me at

https://twitter.com/heyadityapatel


Update 2/7/2022

  • Added first draft of the date time component in WIP


Update 2/7/2022

  • Added the new Accordion component from Ionic 6


Update 1/22/2022

  • General updates to components and updated WIP designs
  • Added links to documentation


Update 10/18/2021

  • Added placeholder and input text instance swapping for ion-input


Update 7/8/2021

  • Added designs for Cycle count and picking app


Update 3/15/2021

  • Fixed instance swapping between ion-items


Update 3/4/2021

  • Refactored Segments component to be easy to customize and support instance swapping
  • Updated popover component to be customizable


Update 25/2/2021

  • Refactored ion-button with new auto layout and simplified expand properties.
  • Added documentation for HC cards


Update 12/2/2021

  • Refactored ion-item component to use new auto layout. Now it's much simpler to use with simple scaling properties.


Update 27/10/2020

  • Added examples for using toolbar and toggle components.
  • Added List Groups
  • Implemented variants for switches and toggles
  • Implemented variants for simple components
